00028 class MAIN_Autoloader
00029 {
00030         private static $instance;
00031 
00032         private $rootdir;
00033         private $loaded = array();
00034         private $classlist = array(
00035                         'MAIN_Controller' => '/app/main/Controller.php',
00036                         'MAIN_Cache'      => '/app/main/Cache.php',
00037                         'MAIN_Config'     => '/app/main/Config.php',
00038                         'MAIN_Error'      => '/app/main/Error.php',
00039                         'MAIN_Logger'     => '/app/main/Logger.php',
00040 
00041                         'DB_Database'     => '/app/db/Database.php',
00042                         'DB_Object'       => '/app/db/Object.php',
00043                         'DB_Table'        => '/app/db/Table.php',
00044 
00045                         'OUT_Request'     => '/app/out/Request.php',
00046                         'OUT_Session'     => '/app/out/Session.php',
00047                         'OUT_Template'    => '/app/out/Template.php' );
00048 
00049         private function __construct($rootdir) {
00050                 if(!is_dir($rootdir)) {
00051                         return false;
00052                 } $this->rootdir = $rootdir;
00053         }
00054 
00055         public function loadClass($classname) {
00056                 if(!array_key_exists($classname, $this->classlist)) {
00057                         return false;
00058                 } elseif(array_key_exists($classname, $this->loaded)) {
00059                         return true;
00060                 } self::loadFile($this->rootdir . $this->classlist[$classname]);
00061                 $this->loaded[$classname] = true;
00062                 return true;
00063         }
00064 
00065         public static function loadFile($filename) {
00066                 if(!file_exists($filename) ||
00067                    !is_file(    $filename) ||
00068                    !is_readable($filename) ) {
00069                         return false;
00070                 } require($filename);
00071                 return true;
00072         }
00073 
00074         public static function getInstance($rootdir = '') {
00075                 if(self::$instance instanceof self) {
00076                         return self::$instance;
00077                 } return self::$instance = new self($rootdir);
00078         }
00079 }
00080 
00081 function __autoload($classname) {
00082         MAIN_Autoloader::getInstance()->loadClass($classname);
00083 }
